711993f-a.title: Manhattan: 31st Street (East) - 2nd Avenue
711993f-a.text:
252-224 East olst Street, north side, west from Second
Avenue. No. 240 is the Protestant Episcopal Chael of the
Incarnation.
July 24, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

711994f-a.title: Manhattan: 31st Street - 2nd Avenue
711994f-a.text:
31st Street, south side, east from No. 232, between Second and
Third Avenues. The Chapel of the Iicarnation, Protestant Episcopal,
is at 240 East 31st Street.
April 27, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
